name: Cutthroats
description: You live on a small seaport island called Hardscrabble -- hardly the hip place to be.  Working as a professional scuba diver, you have the chance to salvage a sunken treasure from one of four shipwrecks, earn the respect of all the old farts and become wealthy beyond all imagination.
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, Amstrad PCW, Apple II, Atari 8-bit, Atari ST, Commodore 16, Plus/4, Commodore 64, DOS, Macintosh, PC Booter, TI-99/4A, TRS-80 | Combined View

shot.caption: Game title and starting a new game.
The game uses a time system. You must pay attention to the clock and meet people at the proper time.
Getting drunk at the Shanty will make you lose a job opportunity.
Get too drunk and you can end up dead! The game gives you a rank based on your progress.
